citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:45 P.M. on
12-Feb-18.
Upon arrival at the facility entrance at 12:45 P.M., the entrance gate was closed/locked. A telephone call was then
immediately made to the licensee. The licensee indicated that he was not on the property and would not return for
several hours.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:45 P.M. on
12-Feb-18.
Upon arrival at the facility entrance at 12:45 P.M., the entrance gate was closed/locked.  A telephone call was then
immediately made to the licensee.  The licensee indicated that he was not on the property and would not return for
several hours.
